mapper.select: /* 관리자 레벨 조회 */ SELECT admin_level, admin_position, CASE WHEN manage_member = 1 THEN 'O' ELSE 'X' END AS manage_member, CASE WHEN manage_contract = 1 THEN 'O' ELSE 'X' END AS manage_contract, CASE WHEN manage_farm = 1 THEN 'O' ELSE 'X' END AS manage_farm, CASE WHEN manage_question = 1 THEN 'O' ELSE 'X' END AS manage_question, CASE WHEN manage_setting = 1 THEN 'O' ELSE 'X' END AS manage_setting, CASE WHEN manage_payment = 1 THEN 'O' ELSE 'X' END AS manage_payment, manage_reg_date FROM admin_level
